E-Mail Messages
Date: Saturday, 3/1/1986
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
SP Porter Mcculloch, 3B Frank Heidelberg, RF Michael Garfield
in return for
SS Juan Chao.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Capital City GM
